title: Lachlan Morton riding all 21 Tour de France stages (plus transfers!) in his Alt Tour
content:
Each team in the Tour de France has eight riders, right? Until now. Sort of. Lachlan Morton is joining the EF Education Nippo Pro Cycling team as the ninth rider, riding his Alt Tour to the Champs-Élysées. He will be riding all 21 Stages and every single transfer, unsupported, in a bid to beat the […]

The post Lachlan Morton riding all 21 Tour de France stages (plus transfers!) in his Alt Tour appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
